data.text: First time staying at Mosaic Hotel in Rambla Catalunya and we can't wait to come back.We were visiting Barcelona (my hometown) during the half term break and we decided to book a couple of nights in this hotel.The stay didn't disappoint.The hotel is located in the city centre just a short walk from Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia.The hotel is located in a beautiful modernist building.We loved the very grand entrance and the modern lift.When we were waiting for our room to be ready we managed to enjoy the views from the rooftop where you can have free coffee ,tea,or hot chocolate.The room was fantastic!!!We were not expecting such a big room and huge bed.The room had a very modern bathroom/shower room with lovely toiletries,a big bed and a big sofa to relax after a long day exploring the city.Our room faced Rambla Catalunya and the views from the balcony were stunning.I am myself originally from Barcelona and I always wanted to stay in a place where i could enjoy being in Rambla Catalunya,a lovely mini Rambla with plenty of great places to eat and amazing boutiques to shop.Just below the hotel there's a very convenient traditional bakery/cafe where we could buy drinks,'bocadillos' or fresh coffee to take away with us.The front desk staff were welcoming and very nice and we will be definitely coming back to Mosaic in our next Barcelona break.
data.title: Beautiful boutique hotel in Barcelona

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Hello, 
Your positive review really made our day ü•∞ We appreciate it!

It's fantastic to hear you enjoyed the spaciousness and comfort of our rooms, along with the stunning views of Rambla Catalunya from your balcony. We're glad the modern bathroom and our selection of toiletries added a touch of luxury to your stay. Isn't it just grand to relax on our rooftop while sipping on a complimentary hot beverage? 
Our front desk team sends their regards and is thrilled to know they made you feel welcome.

See you again soon.
Take care,

Mosaic Barcelona by Ona
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text: We stayed here for one night after spending two weeks biking the Camino Ignaciano.  We arrived early in the day and they stored our luggage for us.  There were a lot of resturants near the hotel.  Normally a lot of shops too I think, but it was their National Day so most shops were closed (that's OK, I don't like shopping anyway).  It was an easy walk to many historic sites.   That evening the staff gladly booked us a taxi to the hotel for the morning saying we needed to pre-arrange a taxi.  We had an interior room. It was small but comfortable.
data.title: Nice hotel in the heart of Barcelona

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Hi üòÅ

We're thrilled to hear that our central location in the heart of Barcelona made it easy for you to explore the city and enjoy the nearby restaurants. It's great that our staff was able to assist you with storing your luggage and arranging a taxi for you. We're glad you found your interior room to be comfortable, even if it was on the smaller side.

We hope you had a fantastic time biking the Camino Ignaciano and that your stay with us was a pleasant way to wrap up your adventure!

Thanks again! Until next time,

Mosaic by Ona Hotels
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text: We were disappointed with our room as we paid extra for a balcony room assuming it was at the front but we got a balcony at the back overlooking a building site with builders staring in‚Ä¶.also there wasn‚Äôt any draws and only small space for hanging clothes‚Ä¶not good for a 4 night stay‚Ä¶also no drink making facilities‚Ä¶only place you could get a drink was from machine on roof terrace‚Ä¶but this was switched off most of the time‚Ä¶‚Ä¶. Good location but quite a basic hotel‚Ä¶. Clean and quite modern‚Ä¶good bed‚Ä¶terrace nice to sit on in the evening.
data.title: Disappointing room given pictures

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Sir,
Thank you for commenting on your stay.

We are glad to hear that you appreciated our comfortable bed, which is an essential aspect of a good night's sleep.

However, we are sorry to learn about the issues you experienced during your stay. Our hotel is due for a renovation, which is planned to take place from September 2023 to June 2024. This will address the concerns you mentioned regarding the room and corridor conditions. 

As for the bar and restaurant hours, we appreciate your feedback and will take it into consideration for future improvements. 

Regarding the shuttle service, we do offer airport transportation through an external partner called CHECK-IN ALLWAYS. We apologize if this information was not clearly communicated to you during your stay.

We would love to have you return in the future. 
Kindest regards,

Monica Moya Amengual, Front office Manager
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text: What a wonderful oasis of calm and tranquility in the heart of Quadrat D‚ÄôOr in Barcelona and in a spectacular setting on Rambla de Catalunya. Beautiful architecture and design and it smells lovely inside too! The roof terrace is quiet and a welcome place to sit and read after a day out at the beach or exploring before getting ready for the evening. The rooms were bigger than expected and elegantly designed. Comfy beds and nice bathroom.  The light shafts between rooms meant that we didn‚Äôt have any neighbours and everyone is lovely - staff and guests. The lift had a glass wall on one side so you could see the height of the building and beautiful light fitting to look at as you moved between floors. Really well thought out as it made it feel airy in this tall slim building rather than getting in a dark box and then arriving at your floor. The staircase is also a thing of beauty and felt very grand. I want to go back to Barcelona for this hotel alone! What a gem. I‚Äôve been going to Barcelona since I was 14yrs old and this was the best experience yet. Fab bakery next door for breakfast and the restaurants in the centre of the street mean that there are always people around, taking a promenade or just sitting and chatting.
data.title: An oasis of calm and beauty in a great location

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Hi there,
Your kind words are music to our ears üòä Thanks for the review.

We're thrilled to hear that you found our hotel to be an oasis of calm and beauty in the heart of Barcelona. 

It's great to know that you appreciated the architecture, design, and lovely scent inside our hotel. 

We're equally happy that you had a pleasant experience with our friendly team and guests, and that you appreciated the unique features of our lift and staircase.

We can't wait to welcome you back to our hotel on your next visit to Barcelona! 
See you soon! üòä

Ona Hotels Mosaic
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text: From the moment we stepped inside this hotel we knew we had chosen the right hotel for us. The manager and girl on reception where friendly and efficient.  The hotel is beautiful and although the room was small and had no view, it had everything you could require with the most comfortable bed. The shower had great pressure and although there is no kettle in the room, there is a coffee Dock on 6th floor with a fabulous roof top sun area. All staff where excellent,  be aware taxis cost around ‚Ç¨50 from the airport. Breakfast was not included but honestly there is an amazing restaurant that is2 doors down, opens at 7.30 am and is well priced and tasty. After our experience I would now have Ona hotels as my go to hotel in any area they are in.
data.title: Little gem Close to everything

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Neville, 
Thank you for taking the time to share your review.

We're so happy to hear that our location and hotel were exactly what you were looking for.

It's great that you appreciated our functional rooms and found our prices to be just right!

Your compliments have us smiling from ear to ear :).

We look forward to welcoming you again. 
All the best.

Ona Hotels Mosaic
